products.title: Bella Blackout Scarlet Red Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Their best-selling bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and inside your home. This bright bold red perfect fit roller blind brightens any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure perfect fit blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.

products.title: Bella Blackout Ruby Red Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Their bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. Our perfect fit blinds are perfect for upvc windows where a screw-free solution is needed. Using sleek framework and brackets that slide under the window beading, their perfect fit blinds come in a wide array of fabrics and finishes to suit your needs.
